task: Develop a basic 'Ticket to Ride' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Distorting time'.
name: Time Warp Rails

branding_data.short_description: A strategic board game where players build railways across time-distorted landscapes.
branding_data.detailed_description: Time Warp Rails is a unique twist on the classic 'Ticket to Ride' board game. Players compete to build railway routes across a map that shifts through different historical periods. As time distorts, routes may change, and players must adapt their strategies to succeed. Collect cards, claim routes, and connect cities while navigating the challenges of time warp events that can alter the board and the rules. The game combines strategic planning with an unpredictable temporal element, offering a fresh experience with every playthrough.
